newsitem.title: USA: Frontier launches flat-rate calling plan.
newsitem.headline: Frontier launches flat-rate calling plan.

text.p: Frontier Corp has introduced an international calling plan that offers customers substantial savings over other services on long-distance service to 53 countries, the company said Monday.
The Frontier Global Connections plan features flat rates 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, with no monthly fees, a news release issued by Frontier said.
The company said the plan was not a promotion or special introductory offer, but rather a fixed plan.
